text:
@BreitbartNews Governor Inslee, a democrat, is repeating the media’s lie.
President Trump did NOT say the Coronavirus was a hoax.

The clips to spread the lie are mashed together bits in a speech where President Trump said: 
The media’s portrayal of him covering the Coronavirus was a hoax!
